ISSUE.TITLE: Product going to remove on shopping cart page when press enter key
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.4.2 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Add two product into cart 2) Now go to cart page and enter any qty number into qty box and press enter button ![aa](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10364140/112129652-a2d04400-8bed-11eb-84ef-916387c42678.gif)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5562 Into wishlist and cart not removed a product when the press enter key
